synopsis.text: Fujimaru Ritsuka, the last hope for humanity, is a beacon of honesty in a world that desperately needs it. However, his unwavering truthfulness often leads to unexpected chaos! In this slapstick anime adaptation of the original manga, Fujimaru's innocent inquiries send the Heroic Spirits into disarray, creating a whirlwind of comedic confusion. Prepare to embark on a surreal journey as Fujimaru navigates the complexities of his role as humanity's last Master. (Source: Assistant)
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
